<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Detection </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return a list of dead units including agents. Dead unit might be inside vehicle.  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''allDeadMen''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>{ deleteVehicle _x } forEach allDeadMen;
</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[allDead]], [[allUnits]], [[allGroups]], [[playableUnits]], [[switchableUnits]], [[units]], [[vehicles]], [[allCurators]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>

<h3 style='display:none'>Notes</h3>
<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on 17 Oct, 2009
<dt class="note">[[User:Pierre MGI|Pierre MGI]]<dd class="note">

As dead men are civilian side, don't try to count them with {side _x isEqualTo EAST} count allDeadMen; result will always be 0.<br>
Use the configfile "side" instead:<br>
0 = [] spawn {while {true} do {sleep 0.1;<br> _westScore = {getNumber (configfile >> "CfgVehicles" >> typeOf _x >> "side") == 0} count allDeadMen;<br> hintSilent format ["East killed: %1",_westScore]};};<br>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
